name: Outpeak 3 Layer Lightweight Shell Pant - Women's

features: Weather protection: The 20k/20k fabric keeps the elements out, while also being extremely breathable
Lightweight comfort: Featuring lightweight Pertex® shield, a high stretch waist and minimalist design, you can move effortlessly through the mountains
Versatile performance: Ideal for freeski and ski touring, this pant also adapts to other outdoor activities like winter mountaineering
